text: Marilyn Priscilla Johnson (born June 19, 1922) is an American politician. She was the United States Ambassador to Togo from 1978 until 1981.Alphabetical List of Chiefs of Mission and Principal Officials, 1778-2005 She was nominated by President Jimmy Carter. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:1922 births Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Marilyn P. Johnson
